title: Sergei Argudyayev
text:
Sergei Nikolayevich Argudyayev (; 11 January 1963 – 1 June 2003) was a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a>er.
Club career.
He made his professional debut in the <a href="Soviet%20Top%20League">Soviet Top League</a> in 1981 for <a href="FC%20Spartak%20Moscow">FC Spartak Moscow</a>. He played 4 games and scored 1 goal in the <a href="European%20Cup%20Winners%27%20Cup%201984%E2%80%9385">European Cup Winners' Cup 1984–85</a> for <a href="FC%20Dynamo%20Moscow">FC Dynamo Moscow</a>.
